attributes.action: Abolish or restrict the disgustingly high car-parking charges in our hospitals putting another unfair burden on people visiting sick relatives and friends
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On Saturday the 17th of February it cost me £10 to park in the visitors car
park for the afternoon after visiting my sick mother in Epsom District Hospital!

rejection.details: This petition ovelaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/hospitalparking/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
